name: Teen Threatening to Jump from Holiday Display

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote:
"There's a teenager on top of the giant Christmas tree display in the atrium—says their parents just told them they're divorcing and they can't take it anymore. Cops are here but they're making it worse. We need someone young, someone who understands. The kid is powered—we've seen sparks. Please hurry."

Requirements

  • De-escalate the situation carefully
  • Connect with the teen—show you understand
  • Get them down safely without triggering their powers
